entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Bay Roberts
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:59 AM NST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 2.
